name: Clunky and the Parallel Dimension
description:
The evil Dr. Simian is up to no good! Him and his cohort Chimpsley have designed a time machine - and Clunky is the test rider! Go back to different eras as Clunky the Robot and put the timeline at ease!

Movement - WASD/Arrows

A - Space, Z, J, Alt

B - Esc, X, K

Start - Enter, Tab

Select - Shift, \ NOTE TO GAMEPAD USERS: This game uses a standard Nintendo layout (A is the *Right* face button and B is the bottom). Gamepad will work as standard past that.
